# toCFAbsoluteTime()

**Instance Method**

Converts an absolute time to a core-foundation absolute time.

## Declaration

```swift
func toCFAbsoluteTime() -> CFAbsoluteTime
```

## Return Value

The core-foundation absolute time.

## Defining the Time Range

- **from**: Fetches sample information that occurs after this time.
- **to**: Fetches sample information that occurs before this time.
- **SRAbsoluteTime**: A value that describes when the system records the data.
- **current()**: Provides the current absolute time.
